The game is working fine. However the cut-scenes have been replaced by 1 shitty video that plays over and over again. If you want to follow the story (like I did), you need to enable the subtitles to read what's happening between the game sessions.

Overall a good rip for a very bad game. The end is awful, unless I missed a CUTSCENE.

JoeKkerr, you should include a small README, explaining how-to install the games and what is missing in them.

Cheers !
